body:
pyqt5 is of type "SipPackage". sippackage class currently downloads sip@4.19.18 as resource, however, py-pyqt5@5.13.1 requires sip@4.19.19 and otherwise yields a build error. I am wondering how different versions of sip resource can be downloaded depending of pyqt version.

@adamjstewart
title: compiling pyqt5@5.13.1
